data.description: Produces ranged infantry units.

data.name: Capital Town Center
data.description:
All Resources can be dropped off here. Produces Villagers, Scouts, and increases your maximum Population. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Capital Town Centers can detect units stealth or disguises.
